Package me.agno.gridjavacore.sorting

Interface IGridSortSettings

All Known Implementing Classes:
QueryStringSortSettings
public interface IGridSortSettings
The IGridSortSettings interface represents the settings for sorting a grid.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getColumnName()
    Retrieves the name of the column associated with this object.
    GridSortDirection
    getDirection()
    Retrieves the direction of sorting in a grid.
    LinkedHashMap<String,List<String>>
    getQuery()
    Retrieves the query for sorting a grid.
    DefaultOrderColumnCollection
    getSortValues()
    Retrieves the sort values associated with the grid.
    void
    setColumnName(String columnName)
    Sets the name of the column associated with this object.
    void
    setDirection(GridSortDirection direction)
    Sets the direction of sorting for the grid column.

  • Method Details

    • getQuery

      LinkedHashMap<String,List<String>> getQuery()
      Retrieves the query for sorting a grid.
      Returns:
      a LinkedHashMap containing the query parameters for sorting the grid. The keys are column names, and the values are Lists of query parameter values.

    • getColumnName

      String getColumnName()
      Retrieves the name of the column associated with this object.
      Returns:
      the name of the column

    • setColumnName

      void setColumnName(String columnName)
      Sets the name of the column associated with this object.
      Parameters:
      columnName - the name of the column

    • getDirection

      GridSortDirection getDirection()
      Retrieves the direction of sorting in a grid.
      Returns:
      the grid sort direction

    • setDirection

      void setDirection(GridSortDirection direction)
      Sets the direction of sorting for the grid column.
      Parameters:
      direction - the direction of sorting for the grid column

    • getSortValues

      DefaultOrderColumnCollection getSortValues()
      Retrieves the sort values associated with the grid.
      Returns:
      a DefaultOrderColumnCollection object containing the sort values for the grid
